long_description: The Skullcandy Icon 3 Taptech stereo headphones pump aggressive bass, natural vocals and precise highs into your skull, letting you experience music the way it was meant to be heard. Taptech feature allows you to access the built-in mic with a simple tap of the finger on the ear cup-even when you're wearing gloves. These headphones rest comfortably on your ears with a low-profile fit; nonslip rubber headband helps keep them in place when you're on the go. Skullcandy Icon 3 Taptech stereo headphones achieve improved durability over their predecessors with a carefully designed mix of quality materials.
short_description: The Skullcandy Icon 3 Taptech stereo headphones pump aggressive bass, natural vocals and precise highs into your skull, letting you experience music the way it was meant to be heard.
